Tenten opens one of her scrolls and releases a large flaming dragon that explodes upon contact.

== Trivia ==
* Although this technique utilises [[wikipedia:Fire|fire]], it is unknown whether it can be classified as a [[Fire Release]] technique, given Tenten's fighting style.
